content: materials to make one throw size or two crib size blankets you ll need… - 1 cotton pure on a cone 1 100% organically grown cotton each cone is approximately 2789 yards/ 1000 grams approximately 1 395 2 700 yards required we used the color peach peony - us 4 3 5 mm 32- or 40-inch circular needles 2 please note if you want to make one crib blanket you ll need just 5 skeins of purl soho s cotton pure 3 or if you want to make the throw but prefer skeins you ll need 10 gauge 28 stitches and 53 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern size crib throw finished dimensions 28 inches wide x 37 inches long 41 inches wide x 51 inches long sample the blanket shown here is the throw size designed by purl soho designer jake canton 4 click here 5 to see even more of jake s designs 1 https //www purlsoho com/cotton-pure-cones html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/cotton-pure html 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/jake-canton-for-purl-soho/ 5 http //www jakecanton com/
